TopicTitle: Hello! Looking to maybe mod a little?

Articles.Content: Instantly fell in love with this game. I'm interested in maybe even making a few little mods, or at least working on some. Would be most interested in stock-alike type stuff or anything that adds to the game play. I have experience with 3d stuff, programming, the usual stuff. Let me know if anyone wants to maybe collaborate a bit and see what we can come up with. Thanks!
Welcome to KSP, you may find the [url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/37-Add-on-Development[/url] forum of particular interest.

Hello CatmanFS, and welcome to the forum!

There are lots of talented people around here to collaborate with. I'm sure you'll fit right in.
Be sure to check out the link Pecan posted above.

Happy landings!
